Package com.cyc.session

The primary interfaces of the Cyc Session API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CycServerAddress
    Describes the address of a Cyc server.
    CycServerInfo
    Provides basic information about the state and location of the server to which the CycSession is connected (or was connected.) All data returned should be generated by examining the current session connection, or retrieved from the server.
    CycSession
    An active (or potentially active) session with a Cyc server.
    CycSessionConfiguration
    This interface defines the set of configuration parameters used by the Session API to establish a new CycSession.
    CycSessionConfiguration.DefaultSessionOptions
    An immutable set of options, including the name of the cyclist making assertions, and the project's KE purpose.
    EnvironmentConfiguration
    A CycSessionConfiguration drawn specifically from the System properties.
    SessionConfigurationLoader
    This interface defines a mechanism for loading CycSessionConfigurations.
    SessionConfigurationProperties
    This defines the canonical set of names for all CycSessionConfiguration properties.
    SessionManager<T extends CycSession>
    The SessionManager is responsible for managing the lifecycle of CycSessions, from configuration, to creation, to caching, to cleanup, and providing appropriate CycSessions to API and application code that requires them.
    SessionOptions
    A set of modifiable options, such as the name of the cyclist making assertions and the project's KE purpose.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CycServer
    Describes the address of a Cyc server.
    CycSessionManager
    The CycSessionManager provides a singleton implementation of a SessionManager.
    ServerAddress
    ServerAddress describes a server's hostname and port.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CycServerReleaseType
    Enum representing Cyc server types.
    CycSession.SessionStatus
    The connection status of a CycSession.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SessionApiException
    SessionApiException is the base exception which indicates that an application library has encountered a problem in interacting with a Cyc server.
    SessionCommandException
    SessionCommandException indicates that Session implementation code could communicate with a Cyc server, but encountered a problem issuing a command or interpreting a result.
    SessionCommunicationException
    SessionCommunicationException indicates that an application library encountered a problem when attempting to communicate with a Cyc server.
    SessionConfigurationException
    CycSessionException indicates that a Cyc session has been mis-configured or not been configured at all.
    SessionInitializationException
    SessionInitializationException indicates that a problem was encountered when initializing a CycSession.
    SessionServiceException
    SessionImplementationExceptions occur when the Session API has trouble loading an implementation class from a service.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    CycSessionManager.CycSessionManagerInitializationError
    Exception thrown if the CycSessionManager cannot find any SessionManager services during class initialization.

Package com.cyc.session Description

The primary interfaces of the Cyc Session API. The Session API defines simple, yet flexible configuration-driven management of Cyc sessions -- such as acquiring server addresses, managing connections, etc. -- so that library and application developers don't need to write it into their own code. At the same time, the API is extensible enough developers can reasonably write their own modules to address unique configuration needs. End users should only need to directly interact with the classes and interfaces defined in com.cyc.session. Interfaces and classes in sub-packages are for implementation providers.
